text: Hi everyone. 3+ years of experience with HubL and HubSpot. I've done everything from integrate HubSpot's API into a Vue app, to building monster SPA-like interactive experiences with simply HubDB and JQuery. I'm happy to talk about full time positions, or helping out if you need some extra muscle in a short term project. Find me on LinkedIn <https://www.linkedin.com/in/grant-foster-53768758/>
